_sText:
This map evolved from one of my older projects. Initially it was a 
hostage rescue map. But I decided to keep things simpler. Uses assets 
from BM Source mod and S.T.A.L.K.E.R. (SDK version). The school building
 itself, materials on buildings, asphalt textures as well as a bunch of 
original graffiti decals are mine. I used the real world photographs I 
made of a real school in the city of Donetsk. Skybox and env settings 
were borrowed from cs_havana. 3D skybox is based on standard HL2 assets,
 so it does not reflect the real location layout.
